resources.string: Welcome to CreateActivity Help \n\nCreate Activity Page is where you will create new activities, where you are required to enter name, description, category, and an image to create a new Activity
Welcome to CreateGoal Help \n\nCreate Goal Page is where you will create goals to your inputted activity, you will need to select hours and a time frame
Welcome to SignUp Help \n\nHere you are required to enter Username and Password to create an account with us to access our application
